rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. If a shaded cell and an unshaded cell are adjacent then the digit in the shaded cell is bigger.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. If a shaded cell and an unshaded cell are adjacent then the digit in the shaded cell is bigger.
